entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Petawawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -7.4°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
